updated_cases.title: domain fronting https traffic from explicit proxy
updated_cases.custom_summary: domain fronting https traffic from explicit proxy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
set host in url and sni different from host header
send traffic with explicit proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
get back a block page with the setting set as blocked
Verify the block page explanation content

updated_cases.title: Enablement of Global Feature Flag of per tenant Domain Fronting Exception List
updated_cases.custom_summary: Enablement of Global Feature Flag of per tenant Domain Fronting Exception List

updated_cases.title: Enablement of Local Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_summary: Enablement of Local Domain Fronting Exception

updated_cases.title: Sending None Donmain Fronting Traffic to Proxy w/ Enabling the Exception List Featture
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending None Donmain Fronting Traffic to Proxy w/ Enabling the Exception List Featture
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Make sure URL is in domain_fronting.json 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Make sure URL is in {list-id}.json
(/opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
6. Send HTTPRequest (none domain fronting but contain the URL not hitting the list)
7. Traffic should not be blocked

updated_cases.title: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic to Proxy w/ Hitting Tenant Exception List
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic to Proxy w/ Hitting Tenant Exception List
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Make sure URL is in domain_fronting.json 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Make sure URL is in {list-id}.json
(/opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
6. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
7. Hitting the exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked

updated_cases.title: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic to Proxy w/o Hitting per Tenant Exception List but in Global Exception List
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic to Proxy w/o Hitting per Tenant Exception List but in Global Exception List
updated_cases.custom_steps:

2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually

4. Make sure URL is not in domain_fronting.json

5. Make sure URL is not in {list-id}.json
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
6. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
7. Didn't hit the exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked
